tagline: A raster processing plugin for QGIS
name: Raster processing suite
body: The Raster Processing Suite provides users with a graphical interface to [PyRaster](https://github.com/talltom/PyRaster) functionality within the QGIS environment. Using the plugin users can open spatial image data, perform raster mathematical operations and create new scenes from the results. Raster processor can also generate on-the-fly Python image processing code for users to develop more advanced tasks such as batch processing.
